Signature of a typed data for a meta transaction.

parameters.description: Channel of meta transaction(optional - default 0)

parameters.description: Nonce within channel of meta transaction

Address of a LicensedUserWallet to proxy the transaction through.

If it is not given, signer's EOA is regarded as from address.

metadata.description: Custom History Metadata conforming to one of the custom-history-* JSON schemas. See startrail-common-js metadata-schemas/.

additionalOffChainMetadata.description: Additional Data that is not directly part of the custom history entry, optional. if used will link Certs to the history and notify other subsystems about the provided data

metadata.description: Custom History Metadata conforming to one of the custom-history-* JSON schemas. See startrail-common-js metadata-schemas/.

historyTypeName.description: Name of Custom History Type in lower case

metadata.description: SRR Metadata conforming to the JSON schema registry-record-metadata.schema.json

note.en: some extra notes in 1 or more languages

lockExternalTransfer.description: SRR flag to disable standard ERC721 transfer methods

requestData.description: Request data for the meta transaction

channelId.description: Nonce Channel to use (optional - defaults to 0)

channelNonce.description: Nonce within the Channel (optional - will query blockchain for the next nonce)

metadata.description: SRR Metadata conforming to the JSON schema registry-record-metadata.schema.json

note.en: some extra notes in 1 or more languages

tokenId.description: tokenId by which SRR data is to be fetched to create metadata description

metadataBatch.description: SRR Metadata conforming to the JSON schema registry-record-metadata.schema.json

metadata.description: SRR Metadata conforming to the JSON schema registry-record-metadata.schema.json

note.en: some extra notes in 1 or more languages

message.description: error message if it is emitted

preimage.description: email to be used in the commit/reveal scheme.

revealHash.description: single keccak256 hash of email to be used in the commit/reveal scheme.

metadata.description: SRR Transfer Metadata conforming to the JSON schema registry-record-transfer-metadata.schema.json

requestData.description: Request data for the meta transaction

channelId.description: Nonce Channel to use (optional - defaults to 0)

channelNonce.description: Nonce within the Channel (optional - will query blockchain for the next nonce)

fromAddress.description: Address of licensed user wallet. If no datafield is set, it is regarded as tx from EOA

revealHash.description: Reveal hash the hash of which matches the commitment in the approveByCommitment

to.description: Address to transfer for ownership to.

isIntermediary.description: Intermediary flag used by startbahn to trigger a transaction. - defaults to false

to.description: Address to transfer for ownership to.

metadata.description: SRR Transfer Metadata conforming to the JSON schema registry-record-transfer-metadata.schema.json

isIntermediary.description: Intermediary flag used by startbahn to trigger a transaction. - defaults to false

txs.description: A JSON array of details of each transactions.

flag.description: the flag to disable standard ERC721 transfer methods

contractAddress.description: Collection contract address. If this one is set, it will be utilized for the collection, otherwise, it will be applied for Startrail Registry.

tokenId.description: SRR Token ID (for already issued SRR). If this one is set, issuerAddress anb metadata will be ignored

metadata.description: SRR Metadata (for draft SRR to check if metadata will apply ERC2981). This one is required if tokenId is not set

note.en: some extra notes in 1 or more languages

issuerAddress.description: Issuer Ethereum Address (for draft SRR). This one is required if tokenId is not set

royaltyReceiver.description: SRR Royalty receiver, null if its ERC2981 is not activated or ineligible

royaltyBasisPoints.description: SRR royalty basis points, null if its ERC2981 is not activated or ineligible

metadata.description: SRR Metadata conforming to the JSON schema registry-record-metadata.schema.json

note.en: some extra notes in 1 or more languages

lockExternalTransfer.description: SRR flag to disable standard ERC721 transfer methods

threshold.description: Number of signatures required to approve a transaction

salt.description: Create2 salt - a random salt is generated if none is given here

owners.description: List of owners Ethereum addresses to add
List of owners Ethereum addresses to remove

name.description: Name of the collection. Will be the same as in metadata.name, but also stored on the contract

contractAddress.description: Contract address of the collection contract. Will be visible on opensea.

ownerAddress.description: Address of the owner of the collection.

metadataCID.description: Collection Contract Metadata CID (TO BE REMOVED)

confirmed.description: Transaction confirmed - a number of blocks have been mined since this one was mined

fixedGasPriceOn.description: Set to true to use fixed gas prices stored in the database.Set to false to use dynamic gas prices from EthGasStation.

defaultGasPriceGwei.description: Gas price to submit transactions with when fixedGasPriceOn=true

defaultMaxFeePerGasPriceGwei.description: Gas price to submit transactions max fee with when fixedGasPriceOn=true

defaultMaxPriorityFeePerGasPriceGwei.description: Gas price to submit transactions priority fee with when fixedGasPriceOn=true

miningTimeoutSeconds.description: Resubmit pending transactions after they have been in the tx pool this many seconds

defaultGasLevel.description: Default EthGasStation price level to use when dynamic prices is on and fixedGasPriceOn = false

relayAdminTxByITX.description: Feature flag enabling ITX relay to handle admin transactions

enableIpfs.description: Feature flag enabling to upload metadata to ipfs

enableIpfsForFile.description: Feature flag enabling to upload file for contract terms and thumbnail to ipfs

enableRoyalty.description: Feature flag enabling to use royalty - ERC2981

asyncTxSend.description: Feature flag enabling to send async transaction

id.description: Fixed id of 1 - only ever 1 row and it will always have id 1

fixedGasPriceOn.description: flag indicating the use of a fixed gas price

defaultGasPriceGwei.description: gas price value for the default gas price in gwei

defaultMaxFeePerGasPriceGwei.description: gas price value for the default maximum fee in gwei

defaultMaxPriorityFeePerGasPriceGwei.description: gas price value for the maximum priority fee in gwei

miningTimeoutSeconds.description: time to wait for confirmation before transactions are resent with a higher bid

oracleEndpoint.description: gas price value for the default gas price

defaultGasLevel.description: gas price level to set transaction processing speed

relayAdminTxByITX.description: flag indicating the usage of relaying admin signed transactions to a wrapping service

enableIpfs.description: flag indicating the usage of uploading metadata to ipfs

enableIpfsForFile.description: flag indicating the usage of uploading file for contract terms and thumbnail to ipfs

enableRoyalty.description: flag enabling to use royalty - ERC2981

asyncTxSend.description: flag indicating the usage of async transaction

updatedAt.description: gas price value for the default gas price

overrideGasPriceGwei.description: Transactions that timeout will be resubmitted with this price if it's set.

isPrivate.description: Boolean to determine the bucket of the file.

action.description: Enum for signedURL purpose, "read" to download, "write" to upload.

filenames.description: Array of name of the file to be saved under given cert ID in storage

action.description: Enum for signedURL purpose, "read" to download, "write" to upload

isPrivateList.description: An optional array of booleans to determine the bucket for each filepath

filepaths.description: array of filepath without bucket name

filepaths.description: An array of filepaths without bucket name

salt.description: Create2 salt - salt used in Collection creation

newOwner.description: New address to transfer collection ownership too
